The efficacy safety 4 different session frequency protocol compare .
DOC.brief_title: Low Intensity Extracorporeal Shock Wave Treatment Erectile Dysfunction : Standardisation Treatment Protocol
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , 4 parallel arm , clinical trial 18-month recruitment period . All patient PDE5I users/responders . After 1 month wash-out period , ED patient screen , order randomize 88 men vasculogenic ED , International Index Erectile Function ED ( IIEF-ED ) domain score 6-25 abnormal penile triplex-based hemodynamic parameter ( peak flow velocity < 35cm/sec ) last 6 month . Additionally , ask complete SEP diary . Patients randomize receive shockwave treatment ( 12 session subject ) , either twice week ( total 6 week ) three time week ( total 4 week ) energy level 4 7 , without treatment interval . Study visit duration Visit 1 ( day 0 ) : basic work-up take place , include medical sexual history , well necessary lab test , need . One month wash-out period follow . During period , subject ask avoid drug relate ED ( PDE5i ) least 2-4 attempt intercourse . Furthermore , patient undergo triplex ultrasonography , unless already do last 6 months.Also penile dimension flaccid erect state measure . Visit 2 ( day 28 + 3 day ) : patient complete IIEF-ED domain randomize one four parallel study group , use online program . Groups A C receive treatment twice per week , energy level 4 7 respectively . Groups B D receive treatment three time per week , energy level 4 7 respectively . PDE5i use prohibit throughout study . Treatment Visits : There 12 active treatment visit 4 Groups . Patients receive LI-ESWT , accord study protocol . Interval 2 treatment 3+1 day Groups A C ( twice/week ) whereas 1+1 day Groups B D ( three times/week ) . At visit 6 12 penile ultrasonography conduct order check potential adverse event related treatment . Follow-up visit 1 - 3 ( 4 , 12 24 week post treatment ) : Patients complete IIEF-ED questionnaire return complete SEP diary last 4 week prior every visit . Visit data also record ( protocol compliance , adverse event ) . At Week 12 , triplex perform standard protocol . For Week 4 + 3 day visit window , whereas week 12 24 + 2 week visit window .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Consent participate 2 . Age > 18 3 . Presence vasculogenic erectile dysfunction least 6 month 4 . Positive response PDE5i 5 . IIEFED score > 6 IIEF score < 26 wash PDE5i 6 . Abnormal penile triplexbased hemodynamic parameter ( peak flow velocity < 35cm/sec ) 7 . Stable heterosexual relationship 3 month 8 . Sexually active agree suspend ED therapy duration study 1 . Any cause ED vascular relate 2 . Previous radiation therapy pelvis 3 . History radical prostatectomy 4 . Clinically significant chronic haematological disease 5 . Cardiovascular condition prevent sexual activity 6 . Peyronie 's Disease penile curvature 7 . History heart attack , stroke life threaten arrhythmia within prior 6 month 8 . Antiandrogens oral injectables androgens 9 . Untreated Hypogonadism demonstrate abnormal testosterone level 10 . Malignancy within past 5 year 11 . Any unstable medical , psychiatric condition spinal cord injury 12 . Anatomical neurological abnormality treatment area 13 . Use treatment ED within 7 day screen ( oral medication , vacuum device , constrictive device , injection urethral suppository ) 14 . Known allergy ultrasound gel
DOC.keyword: Low intensity extracorporeal shock wave treatment
